summary: AirAsia, headquartered near Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, is the largest low-cost airline in Malaysia. It flies to over 166 destinations in 25 countries and has its main base at Kuala Lumpur International Airport. The airline has been a leader in low-cost travel in Asia and has won awards for being the world's best low-cost carrier for 15 years straight. AirAsia also sponsors football teams in Malaysia and Singapore, as well as other events like Taylor Swift's Red Tour in Asia.
title: AirAsia
